en: the star that gives light and heat to the earth
ex: There were ten suns in the sky.

en: a person who shoots arrows with a bow
ex: Hou Yi was a great archer.

en: a weapon used for shooting arrows
a thin pointed stick shot from a bow
ex: He shot arrows at the suns.

en: a low area between hills or mountains
ex: The goddess Xihe lived in the Valley of Light.
Xihe was the goddess of the suns.

en: a large body of water surrounded by land
ex: She washed the suns in the lake.

en: a mythical tree where the suns rested
ex: She placed them on the Fusang tree.

en: a brave person admired for doing something good
ex: Hou Yi became a hero to the people.
The heat made plants and animals suffer.

en: to keep someone or something safe
